return false;

i do have doantor == 1

character-pin = 0 character-pkPoints = 350 character-saradomin = 0 character-retaliate = 0 character-action = 0 character-pcpoints = 150 character-assault = 80 character-donator = 1 character-bow = 100 character-donorPoints = 1 character-shield = 100 character-rating = 0 character-hween09 = 0 [/quote]

This is the wrong section, but I will help you…

In your server’s client.java, there should be the import player file bull crap and in it

it should say like

donator = token2

thats not what it will say, but still, blah blah blah…if it says something else than donator

Like lets say this…

instead of donator, it says member…

you would need to declare in the code, member == 1

this simply because that’s what it is nicknamed…
